overview: Marina doesn't take school too seriously and as a result hasn't graduated yet. She knows there is one surefire way to make sure Mr. Carson lets her pass this time around. Lilly needs a ride before school...hope her stepdad's available. Cutie Riley Star is used to getting what she wants, which the easy way is out. She seduces her teacher's assistant Bambino in an exchange for a passing grade in Spanish. He cannot resist her tight little body and it isn't long before he's fucking her in her room while her parents aren't home! Blonde hottie Gabbie Carter got all the passing grades this year, and Logan Long's big dick as an added bonus!
title: After School Sluts 3
